comment: how could you think , it can compete other brands by low photography where other brands comes with 48MP quad rear camera

Looking awesome... I purchased it for my younger brother He is very Happy to get this Phone..Nice and very fast delivery....I hope It's camera and performance will be good also...I will Review it again after someday of using it..
Nice phone...but price little bit high

Chose this mobile because few others were having later delivery and our area was to go in for lockdown.Prime very fast delivery. Kudos to Amazon.About the mobile it's a good piece. But better to go for the 6 GB ram variant.Selfie camera outperforms the primary camera which is according to the specs.Overall a good decent mobile at the price point, considering all aspects.Pros at this price1. 6.5 inch full hd is good2. 128 GB internal memoryCons at this price1. Primary camera is actually bad2. 4gb ram, can't multitask.3. Snapdragon older.
